noun.description: A strip of material used to bind a wound or to protect an injured part of the body.
examples: her leg was swathed in bandages
a sterile adhesive bandage with nonstick pad

verb.description: Bind (a wound or a part of the body) with a protective strip of material.
examples: bandage the foot so that the ankle is supported
the doctors bandaged up his wounds

origin: Late 16th century: from French, from bande (see band).
